title: Crypto bills are ‘like oil for the onchain economy,’ Coinbase exec says
summary: Coinbase's Shan Aggarwal and Scott Meadows spoke to Cointelegraph at the Blockchain Futurist Conference on the future of the industry in the US.

title: Cathie Wood drops BTC forecast by $300K, says stablecoins eroding market share
summary: Stablecoins have emerged as a store-of-value asset in emerging market economies at a rate no one predicted, Wood said on Thursday.

title: Google Finance adds prediction markets data in new AI-powered update
summary: The update brings real-time forecasting data from Kalshi and Polymarket to Google Finance, as more major platforms move into the growing prediction markets space.

title: Circle weighs in on GENIUS Act implementation: ‘Simple, strong rules’
summary: The US Treasury Department accepted comments related to the implementation of the stablecoin bill until Tuesday as part of the law’s planned rollout.

title: Bitcoin bulls retreat as spot BTC ETF outflows deepen and macro fears grow
summary: Bitcoin’s slide toward $100,000 accelerates as ETF outflows, weak earnings, and macro uncertainty rattle traders, leaving bulls hesitant to reenter the market.

title: Ray Dalio warns Fed is stimulating the economy into a bubble
summary: Current fiscal and monetary policies will cause hard asset prices to rise, but both are signs of late-stage economic decay, Dalio said.

title: Jurors ask pointed questions in MEV bot trial as deliberations proceed
summary: As deliberations entered their second day in a criminal trial over a $25 million exploit, jurors asked for clarification on previous testimony and the definition of “good faith.”

title: $100B in old Bitcoin moved, raising ‘OG’ versus ‘trader’ debate
summary: Over $100 billion in old Bitcoin has moved as spot ETFs see record outflows, igniting debate over whether true OGs or traders are driving the market sell-off.

title: The truth behind Zcash comeback in 2025
summary: Privacy-focused protocol Zcash has received newfound support from industry experts and influencers, sending its native token price to multiyear highs this year.

title: Bitcoin ‘$68K too low’ versus gold says JPMorgan as BTC, stocks dip again
summary: JPMorgan said that the latest BTC price drawdown meant that Bitcoin was now undervalued compared to gold, in contrast to the end of 2024.
